initSQL: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS jst_demo_db;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `jst_demo_counter` (`id` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `gmt_created` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `gmt_modified` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8;
